alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:09AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...MAX HEAT INDICES BETWEEN 105 AND 110 DEGREES ON SOUTH PADRE ISLAND AND BOCA CHICA BEACH TODAY... The combination of above average temperatures and supportive dew point temperatures will produce heat indices, or "feels like" temperatures, up to 110 degrees this afternoon on the barrier island, including the city of South Padre Island and Boca Chica beach. Maximum heat indices will occur between 12 PM and 6 PM this afternoon. If spending time outside today, drink plenty of water, apply and reapply sunscreen often, wear light weight and light colored clothing, and take frequent breaks from the heat. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in minutes.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
